Upgrade.Title: Sabotage
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target a ship at Range 1-3. Target ship must disable 2 Active Shields, if possible. If the target ship has no Active Shields or if this Action causes the target ship to have no Active Shields, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Orion Tactical Officer
Upgrade.Ability: If you damage an opponent's Hull with a [CRIT], you may immediately discard this card to search the Damage Deck for a "Weapons Malfunction" or a "Munitions Failure" card instead of drawing a random Damage Card. Re-shuffle the Damage Deck when you are done. No ship may be equipped with more than one "Orion Tactical Officer" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Andorian Helmsman
Upgrade.Ability: During the Combat Phase, after you complete your attack, you may discard this card to immediately perform a 1 or 2 Maneuver (straight or bank). If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. No ship may be equipped with more than one "Andorian Helmsman" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Emergency Bulkheads
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to flip all critical damage cards assigned to your ship face down. If your ship is not cloaked and you have no Active Shields, each time you defend this round, roll +1 defense die.

Upgrade.Title: Enhanced Hull Plating
Upgrade.Ability: During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, if your ship is not Cloaked and you have no Active Shields, you may add up to 2 [EVADE] results to your defense roll. If you do so, place 1 Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship for each [EVADE] result you added with this Upgrade. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Mirror Universe ship with a Hull value of 4 or less. You cannot deploy more than 1 "Enhanced Hull Plating" Upgrade to any ship.

Upgrade.Title: Photonic Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Plasma Cannons
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.
